Printed by Ja. Flesher for M.F., J. Marriot, and R. Royston, London : MDCXLIX [1649]
Imperfect: print show-through with slight loss of print. Pages 173-174 torn with some loss of print. Pages 163-184 from British Library copy spliced at end. Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
